page.title: 10TENNIS IN ENCHMARSH,SHROPS.
page.content: I married a farmer 20 years ago and came to live in Enchmarsh. I began playing tennis at 8 on a grass court specially built by my parents. As there was no local qualified coach,I travelled every Saturday for a half- hour lesson costing 10/6d.--old money. I have completed 25 years playing for Shropshire Ladies and took over as Captain 6 years ago. Living in a rural area is a disadvantage as I have to travel 28 miles to my club in Shrewsbury. In the winter I travel 50 miles to play at the newly opened indoor courts at Telford. Court hire here is Â£6 per hour, and with petrol at Â£2 per gallon, tennis is no longer a cheap sport.
